question: where is the tablet of the ten commandments
vanilla_rag_result: The tablets of the Ten Commandments are depicted on the Menorah in their traditional form of two rectangular tablets with rounded tops. Additionally, they are represented in the big cartouche at the top left quadrant of a map, where biblical leaders Moses and Aaron are shown placing their hands on the Tablets of the Law with the Ten Commandments inscribed in Hebrew. Furthermore, the Master of the Altarpiece of the Ten Commandments, a painting from the early fifteenth century, also depicts the Ten Commandments.
